channel.title: Type Systems on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Type Systems on jverkamp.com

item.title: Adventures in optimization, re: Typed Racket
item.description: Last Thursday I wrote a post about generating Perlin/simplex noise in Racket. Later that day, I posted to the Racket mailing list asking how I could make it faster. What resulted was a whole sequence of responses (primarily about Typed Racket) and a bit of a rabbit hole that I’m still trying to wrap my head around.
